#summary Why provide a UI generator
#labels Featured

= Why UI generator =

  * Accelerate the development
  Just define domain object, the ui will generator automatic.
  Especially now no visual development tools for GWT.
  * Unified User Interface
  All ui interface have same operation of habits and layout
  * Validate
    # Locate validate
    # Validate Expression support
    # Remote validate and call back
  * Editors
    # Scalable structure allows you to add different editor for different data types
    # Solation system with a variety of third-party widget libraries
  * Reusable code
    # ui layout( you can implement multi ui layout, one for 320*240 PDA, one for Desktop browser, then dynamic load the layout for different browser
    # The structure can be extended, for different data types you can add different editors, the domain object just provide data and the needn't know complexity of this.
